SELECT ACT_CD, ACT_NM, ACT_NUM, ACT_TEL
FROM C_ACT WHERE ACT_DIV = 'ACT-TYPE1' ORDER BY ACT_CD
SELECT PRD_CD, PRD_NM FROM C_PRD ORDER BY PRD_CD

SELECT I.PRD_LOT, P.PRD_NM, TO_CHAR(I.EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS EDATE
FROM C_PRD P JOIN B_IN I ON P.PRD_CD = I.PRD_CD ORDER BY I.PRD_LOT

SELECT BIN.PRD_LOT, BIN.SAMT, TO_CHAR(BIN.POD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS POD_DATE, TO_CHAR(BIN.EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS EDATE, P.PRD_CD
FROM B_IN BIN JOIN C_PRD P ON P.PRD_CD = BIN.PRD_CD
WHERE P.PRD_CD = #{prdCd} AND BIN.SAMT > 0 ORDER BY BIN.PRD_LOT

SELECT OD.OD_CD, I.PRD_LOT, P.PRD_NM, A.ACT_CD, A.ACT_NM, OD.OD_AMT, OU.BAMT, TO_CHAR(OU.BDATES,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS BDATES
FROM B_OD OD
JOIN B_OUT OU ON OD.OD_CD = OU.OD_CD
JOIN C_PRD P ON OD.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON OD.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
JOIN B_IN I ON I.PRD_LOT = OU.PRD_LOT
JOIN B_RT R ON R.PRD_LOT = I.PRD_LOT
WHERE R.RE_CD IS NULL ORDER BY OD.OD_CD

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM B_OD OD WHERE OD.OD_CD = ( SELECT POD.OD_CD FROM B_POD POD WHERE OD.OD_CD = POD.OD_CD AND POD.OD_CD = #{odCd})
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(OD.OD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS OD_DATE, OD.OD_CD, P.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, A.ACT_CD, A.ACT_NM, OD.OD_AMT
FROM B_OD OD
JOIN C_PRD P ON OD.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
JOIN C_ACT A ON A.ACT_CD = OD.ACT_CD
JOIN B_IN I ON OD.PRD_CD = I.PRD_CD
WHERE OD.OD_STS = 'ORD-STS1' AND I.SAMT > 0
AND TRUNC(OD.OD_DATE) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY OD_DATE

INSERT INTO B_OUT ( OUT_NO, BDATES, BAMT, EDATE, PRD_CD, ACT_CD, OD_CD, PRD_LOT, OUT_ETC ) VALUES ( #{outNo}, CURRENT_DATE, #{bamt}, #{edate}, #{prdCd}, #{actCd}, #{odCd}, #{prdLot}, #{outEtc} )
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(R.RE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS RE_DATE, R.RE_CD, I.PRD_LOT, (SELECT PRD_NM FROM C_PRD WHERE PRD_CD = I.PRD_CD) AS PRD_NM, A.ACT_NM, A.ACT_CD, OD.OD_AMT, R.RE_AMT, ABS(OD.OD_AMT - R.RE_AMT) AS BAMT
FROM B_OUT OU
JOIN B_OD OD ON OD.OD_CD = OU.OD_CD
JOIN B_RT R ON R.ACT_CD = OU.ACT_CD
JOIN B_IN I ON R.PRD_LOT = I.PRD_LOT
JOIN C_ACT A ON R.ACT_CD = A.ACT_CD
WHERE TRUNC(R.RE_DATE) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY RE_DATE

SELECT mk_bre_cd from dual
INSERT INTO B_RT ( RE_DATE, RE_CD, PRD_LOT, ACT_CD, RE_AMT ) VALUES ( CURRENT_DATE, #{reCd}, #{prdLot}, #{actCd}, #{reAmt} )
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(POD.PODD_DATES,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS POD_DATE, I.PRD_LOT, P.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, I.SAMT, TO_CHAR(I.EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS EDATE, CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE + 4 > I.EDATE THEN '경고' ELSE '양호' END AS EDATE_YN
FROM B_IN I
JOIN P_ODD POD ON POD.PODD_CD = I.PODD_CD
JOIN C_PRD P ON P.PRD_CD = I.PRD_CD WHERE I.SAMT > 0
AND P.PRD_CD = #{prdCd}
ORDER BY I.EDATE

SELECT TO_CHAR(POD.PODD_DATES,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS POD_DATE, I.PRD_LOT, P.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, I.AG_AMT, TO_CHAR(I.EDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS EDATE
FROM B_IN I
JOIN P_ODD POD ON POD.PODD_CD = I.PODD_CD
JOIN C_PRD P ON P.PRD_CD = I.PRD_CD
WHERE I.AG_AMT IS NOT NULL

SELECT O.OD_CD, P.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, O.OD_AMT, TO_CHAR(O.DE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DE_DATE, (SELECT SUM(SAMT) FROM B_IN WHERE PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD GROUP BY PRD_CD) AS SAMT
FROM B_OD O JOIN C_PRD P ON O.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD ORDER BY O.OD_CD
mapper.insert:
SELECT mk_prqt_no from dual
INSERT INTO B_POD ( RQT_NO, RQT_DATE, OD_CD, PRD_CD, RQT_AMT, RQT_STS ) VALUES ( #{rqtNo}, CURRENT_DATE, #{odCd}, #{prdCd}, #{rqtAmt}, 'RQT-STS1' )
mapper.select:
SELECT C.PRD_CD, C.PRD_NM, B.SAMT, C.PRD_SFAMT, CASE WHEN (C.PRD_SFAMT * 0.7) >= B.SAMT THEN '위험' WHEN (C.PRD_SFAMT * 0.8) >= B.SAMT THEN '경고' WHEN (C.PRD_SFAMT * 0.9) >= B.SAMT THEN '관심' ELSE '정상' END AS PRD_SFAMT_STS
FROM (SELECT I.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM, SUM(I.SAMT) AS SAMT FROM B_IN I
JOIN C_PRD P ON I.PRD_CD = P.PRD_CD
GROUP BY I.PRD_CD, P.PRD_NM) B
JOIN C_PRD C ON B.PRD_CD = C.PRD_CD
WHERE C.PRD_CD = #{prdCd}
ORDER BY B.SAMT ASC
